meanings.definition: The act of secreting an excessive amount of a substance.
meanings.sent1: The oversecretion of oil by the skin can lead to acne.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with oversecretion of hormones.
meanings.sent3: The oversecretion of laughter during the serious meeting caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her oversecretion of kindness made her a favorite among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The oversecretion of water in the plant caused it to wilt and die.

meanings.definition: The state of producing too much of a particular substance.
meanings.sent1: Oversecretion of saliva can be a symptom of certain medical conditions.
meanings.sent2: The oversecretion of mucus in the body can lead to congestion.
meanings.sent3: The oversecretion of excitement before the surprise party was hard to contain.
meanings.sent4: The oversecretion of ideas in the brainstorming session led to a productive outcome.
meanings.sent5: The oversecretion of perfume in the room was overwhelming.
